name: symfony/polyfill-mbstring
description: Symfony polyfill for the Mbstring extension

suggest.psr/log: To use logging capability in translator

suggest.symfony/proxy-manager-bridge: Generate service proxies to lazy load them

suggest.symfony/config: If you want to use Config component to manage resources
suggest.symfony/translation: If you want to use Symfony2 translations adapter
suggest.symfony/yaml: If you want to parse features, represented in YAML files

suggest.behat/mink-extension: for integration with Mink testing framework
suggest.behat/symfony2-extension: for integration with Symfony2 web framework
suggest.behat/yii-extension: for integration with Yii web framework

name: sebastian/version
description: Library that helps with managing the version number of Git-hosted PHP projects

name: sebastian/environment
description: Provides functionality to handle HHVM/PHP environments

name: phpunit/php-file-iterator
description: FilterIterator implementation that filters files based on a list of suffixes.

name: phpunit/php-code-coverage
description: Library that provides collection, processing, and rendering functionality for PHP code coverage information.

name: doctrine/instantiator
description: A small, lightweight utility to instantiate objects in PHP without invoking their constructors

name: sebastian/recursion-context
description: Provides functionality to recursively process PHP variables

name: sebastian/exporter
description: Provides the functionality to export PHP variables for visualization

name: sebastian/comparator
description: Provides the functionality to compare PHP values for equality

name: phpspec/prophecy
description: Highly opinionated mocking framework for PHP 5.3+

name: phpspec/php-diff
description: A comprehensive library for generating differences between two hashable objects (strings or arrays).
